title: The white cockade =
author: Grant, James
snippet: " Stow your infernal twaddle, old Testimony, and bear a hand yourself,^^ bellowed Scupperplug; " I've promised the hands a stoup o^ skiedam when the run is complete, so look sharp. I never liked this place for sending a cargo ashore; Seacliff cave, or even Tyninghame sands are worth a score of it.^^
